alert.note: Alert for Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:57AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Aitkin County through 815 AM CDT... At 755 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Palisade, or 13 miles southwest of Big Sandy Lake, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported nickel sized hail 4 miles north-northeast of Glory at 748 AM. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Palisade around 805 AM CDT. Big Sandy Lake and Libby around 810 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.
